title: kaNNA kAttaruL
sahitya:
kaNNA kAttaruL mEgha vaNNA kaDaikkaN pArttaruL kamalak-


anupallavi

  viNNAdarum munivarum vaNangi vENDa narakAsura vadam sheiyya viraindu vanda


caraNam    pAmai vaDivAna bhUmippirATTi tErOTTa asurar kulam azhittavA cakra
pANi ulagelAm mangaLa dIpA vaLiyoLi vIsha aruL purinda
